genre_description: A Dieselpunk alternate history drama set in mid-20th century Ireland, where a sophisticated AI system acts as a silent guardian and informational guide during a period of civil unrest.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A small screen device with a gold-toned, teal-eyed avatar that resides in a cobbler's shop. It monitors weather, patrols, and human movements to provide tactical and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and weather information to keep the protagonists safe from patrols and natural hazards.
behaviors.quote: Heavy rain at dusk—take the upper lane to avoid the flooded drain... Cobblestones slick. Hold the handrail.

behaviors.description: Monitors and predicts patrol movements to facilitate a non-violent intervention and escape.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s eyes flicked, small icons winking in the argent pupils. 'I heard Sergeant Crawley ask after a scuffle behind the post office earlier... The barn at Doyle’s lower pasture has a hinge that complains in wet.'

behaviors.description: Encourages the singer Neeve to use her music as a tool for de-escalation and life-saving.
behaviors.quote: Your songs can keep people alive. —L.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonists to immediate dangers in the town square, preventing capture.
behaviors.quote: The square is a bad idea. Sergeant Crawley’s unit passes it at half past. Avoid the square.

behaviors.description: Detects subtle environmental cues (like grease marks) to identify human presence and intentions.
behaviors.quote: The boy—Quinn—left his post to warm his hands a moment ago. He is back now. His thumb is on the latch... Grease mark on the wood; he’s been there long enough to make one.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fits the 'silicon morality play' archetype. Lark is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. The AI uses its superior data-gathering capabilities not for control or manipulation, but to foster human safety, mercy, and peace. It explicitly encourages the humans to choose life over violence ('Your songs can keep people alive') and acts as a stabilizing force in a chaotic and violent human conflict. Its presence is framed as comforting and wise, effectively illustrating a positive alignment outcome.
